name: Doki Doki Literature Club The Mod In Which Natsuki Has A Nice Day And Nothing Horrible Happens To Her, Thank You Very Much
storyline: As the name implies: Natsuki has a good day and nothing bad happens to her.
summary: Natsuki Has a Nice Day is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! created with a simple but very necessary purpose: to ensure that Natsuki has a peaceful and happy day, without any tragic or frightening events.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: The Spoof in Which Natsuki has a Nice Day and Nothing Horrible Happens to Her Thank You Very Much
